text: The 2015 Novilon EDR Cup was a bicycle race in the Netherlands, which formed part of the Dutch one day women's elite race season. It was held on 15 March 2015 over a distance of . It was rated by the UCI as a 1.2 category race.http://www.procyclingstats.com/race.php?id=151366 ==Results== ==See also== *2015 in women's road cycling ==References== ==External links== * Category:Ronde van Drenthe (women's race) Novilon EDR Cup Novilon EDR Cup Novilon EDR Cup
title: 2015 Novilon EDR Cup
